rules_text:
Untap target land. Scry 1.
Fabled {3}{G}{G} [i](Then if you cast this for its fabled cost, put it onto the battlefield transformed attached to that land.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds two mana in any combination of colors [i](in addition to the mana the land produces.)[/i]
